statements: SELECT * FROM online_offline_sales_data WHERE order_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM online_offline_sales_data WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT channel, total_amount FROM online_offline_sales_data ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM online_offline_sales_data WHERE channel = 'Online' AND order_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT AVG(total_amount) AS avg_amount FROM online_offline_sales_data WHERE channel = 'Offline';
SELECT * FROM online_offline_sales_data ORDER BY total_amount DESC, order_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, channel, total_amount FROM online_offline_sales_data WHERE channel = 'online' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM online_offline_sales_data WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM online_offline_sales_data WHERE channel = 'offline' AND order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM online_offline_sales_data WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM online_sales
SELECT product_id, customer_id FROM online_sales WHERE id = 5
SELECT id, product_id, customer_id, sale_date FROM online_sales WHERE sale_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM offline_sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC, product_id ASC
SELECT store_id, sale_date FROM offline_sales
SELECT * FROM online_sales WHERE sale_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, customer_id FROM online_sales WHERE customer_id = 1001 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT id, product_id, store_id FROM offline_sales WHERE product_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT id, sale_date FROM offline_sales WHERE store_id = 2001 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_sales, MAX(sale_date) AS latest_sale_date FROM offline_sales WHERE sale_date < '2022-04-01';
SELECT * FROM OnlineSales ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT sale_id, total_amount, store_id FROM OfflineSales WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM OnlineSales WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM OnlineSales WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT sale_id, store_id, total_amount FROM OfflineSales WHERE store_id = 3 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM OfflineSales GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 5000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM online_sales ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, order_date FROM online_sales WHERE customer_id = 101 AND product_name = 'Mobile Phone';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price > 500 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%1234%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, sale_date FROM offline_sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM online_sales WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT p.product_name, o.sale_date FROM offline_sales o JOIN products p ON o.product_name = p.product_name WHERE o.customer_id = 200;

SELECT c.customer_name, o.order_date, p.category FROM online_sales o JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN products p ON o.product_name = p.product_name WHERE o.order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM OnlineSales;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, quantity FROM OfflineSales WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM Products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%';
SELECT sale_id, customer_id, sale_date FROM OfflineSales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM OnlineSales WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT customer_id, product_name, quantity FROM OnlineSales WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%'
SELECT location_name, city, state_province FROM Locations WHERE country = 'USA'
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM Products ORDER BY unit_price DESC
